item.title: A Quick Start Guide to Building ZAP
item.description: Have you ever wanted to play around with the ZAP codebase but felt it was too overwhelming? This guide will walk you through building ZAP from the command line regardless of the operating system and IDE you're using. Letâ€™s jump right into it! Preparation All you need is a working local installation of git and JDK 8+.
